JobFullDesc: As the fastest growing business application in Microsoft’s history, Teams is redefining how our customers collaborate and communicate in their environments. Teams addresses the needs of a diverse workforce by providing a hub for collaboration. It brings together multiple communication methods of chat, messaging, calling, and meetings, along with document collaboration, plus third-party and custom line-of-business apps.As customers rely on Teams for their business-critical collaboration, their needs around privacy, safety, security, and compliance continue to grow. We have a responsibility to help keep our customers safe and, in partnership with security product groups both within and outside Microsoft, we have an opportunity to truly differentiate Teams as the most secure and trustworthy collaboration platform. We are looking for a self-starting, entrepreneurial Principal Program Manager Lead who will manage a team to shape the future of secure and trustworthy collaboration in Teams.We are a dynamic and agile team in the Microsoft Teams product group.
